Kenya - Rural Access Roads Project : Loan
            1305 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Kenya - Rural Access Roads

docna.cdata!:
Kenya - Rural Access Roads Project : Credit
            0651 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Kenya - Rural Access Roads
            Project : Credit 0651 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project will assist the Government
            in implementing the first phase of the Rural Access Road
            Program (RARP) by: (i) equipping and operating eight
            construction units for three years each; (ii) equipping the
            STD Training Expansion Program; (iii) technical services for
            RARP; (iv) evaluating and monitoring the RARP; and (v)
            maintenance and repair of the roads constructed under the RARP.
